body:
Add FASTMath packages
- mesquite
- chombo (still problems with fortran name mangling)
- pumi
- phasta (still problems on osx)
- fastmath (uber package)

Modify packages
- boxlib to add variant for dims
- disable tools in moab

Modify setup-env.csh to only refer to $SYS_TYPE if its defined. Should probably be done for other shell types as well.

Chombo should probably be merged with...
https://github.com/drhansj/spack.git
branch develop
var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/chombo-xsdk/package.py

Finally, not sure I am doing this quite right. I am submitting this from same working copy I did an earlier pull request for ZFP from. Do I need to do something different to submit a pull request from that same working copy for entirely new work?
title: Adding FASTMath uber package and missing FASTMath packages
